name: Sonic Colors - Tropical Resort Act.1 in Unreal Engine
name_original: Sonic Colors - Tropical Resort Act.1 in Unreal Engine
description:
Is not finished, i know that are a lot of things to do but i launch this version to know your opinion about: if works the character movement, if there is no bugs etc...

The Models and sounds are from SEGA, and the particles from the Epic Games Marketplace, I did everything else (animations and programmation)

Hope you enjoy :D
